name: Deadlift
text: Arguably deadlift is the king of all exercises, the deadlift hits every major muscle group hard, and is perhaps the greatest test of strength.

name: Back squat
text: Just like the deadlift, the barbell back squat hits just about every major muscle group there is in the body and is the king of leg-developing movements.

name: Bench Press
text: Every gym-goer in the world has been asked “Whaddya bench?” at least once. This move is responsible for developing powerful, well-defined pecs, shoulders.

name: Dumbbell romanian deadlift
text: This could be the most important exercise there is for lower-back health and developing an impressive set of glutes.

name: Kettlebell swing
text: Often confused as a squat and front raise combo for the legs and shoulders, respectively, this move is actually an explosive hip hinge, great for the glutes and conditioning.

name: Suspended pushup
text: In a pushup, the instability of the handles leads to more muscle fiber activation.
